titleStmt.title: The works of the Honourable Robert Boyle, Esq., epitomiz'd by Richard Boulton ... ; illustrated with copper plates.
Works. 1699
titleStmt.author: Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.
Boulton, Richard, b. 1676 or 7. General heads for the natural history of a country.

biblFull.extent: 4 v., 7 leaves of plates (some folded) : ill., port.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Phillips ... and J. Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Vol. 4 has imprint: London : Printed, and are to be sold by T. Bennet and J. Wyat, 1700.
Vol. 4 contains: A general idea of the epitomy of the works of Robert Boyle, Esq.; to which are added, General heads for the natural history of a country / by R. Boulton. London, 1700. 2 p.l., 122 p.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
Imperfect: vol. 4 lacking in filmed copy.
